title: The Lancashire Levite rebuk'd, or, A farther vindication of the dissenters from popery, superstition, ignorance and knavery unjustly charged on them by Mr. Zachary Taylor in his two books about the Surey demoniak in a letter to himself.
author: Carrington, John, d. 1701.
publisher: Printed by R.J. and sold by A. Baldwin ...,
